name: Cat Leo's Bakery Kitchen Game
description:
Enter the delicious pastry shop of Leo Catomy the cat.
Cook and bake delicious cakes, pastries and desserts and serve all your hungry customers in this free addictive time-management game! 
Serve your customers always as quick as possible to make them feel happy and to get good reviews for your shop.
Remember that if you collect to many bad reviews from your customers your shop will be closed down. Therefore serve your customer always before time runs out.

Features:
- Cool graphics
- Many exciting levels to play
- Match at least 3 pastries
- Special objects
- Kids friendly content with Leo Catomy

How to play: Serve Leo Catomy's customers the sweets they want in the shortest time possible.
You will need to connect at least 3 sweets to get an order done. To get more points or activate a combo you need to connect as many sweets as possible and serve them to his sometimes crazy customers.

You can get some special items that will help you run your shop better, like:

The Hammer, to renovate the shop
The Gingerbread will unlock new sorts of cookies
The smile will make your visitors patience increase limiting the bad reviews.
Time Freeze and many other helpful items can be unlocked

What are you waiting for? Join Leo Catomy the cat and his special clients in this amazing cooking game.
